column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Hazorhen Jabin tsee no
column8: "nye ahemfo a wɔwɔ kwaamu afamu wɔ nkokodo nkurow no mu
column9: nye Araba Kinnerot no pomu afamu
column11: nye Dor akoko do wɔ anee afamu
column17: nye Jebusfo a wɔwɔ nkokodo nkurow mu
column18: nye Hivifo a wɔwɔ Hermon ase wɔ Mizpa asaase do no nyinara nkyɛn."

column2: "Na wɔnye hɔn dɔm nyinara ka hɔn ho sii mu kɔree
column3: nkurow pii
column4: hɔn dodow tse dɛ mpoano anhwea

column2: "Na ahemfo yi nyinara kehyiae; na wɔbaa bɛkyeer nsera fakor wɔ Merom nsu no ho
column3: dɛ wɔnye Israel robɔko."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Josua dɛ
column3: Mma onnsian hɔn ntsi ma w'akoma nntu: na ɔkyena siseber yi na mibeyi hɔn nyinara atɔfun ama wɔ Israel enyim: twitwa hɔn mpɔnkɔ anantsir
column4: na fa ogya hyew hɔn ntseaseanam."

column2: "Nna Josua
column3: nye nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no nyinara baa hɔn do awerɛfir mu wɔ Merom nsu no ho

column2: "Na EWURADZE yii hɔn hyɛɛ Israel nsa
column3: na wokunkum hɔn
column4: na wotsiiw hɔn araa dze kodur Zidon kɛse no
column6: nye Mizpe ɔbɔn mu boka afamu; na wokunkum hɔn kodur dɛ woenngyaa hɔn mu biara ma ɔaannka."

column2: "Na Josua yɛɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no: otwitwaa hɔn mpɔnkɔ anantsir
column3: na ɔdze ogya hyeew hɔn ntseaseanam."

column2: "Na Josua saan n'ekyir aber no ara mu
column3: na ɔkɛgyee Hazor
column4: na ɔdze afona kum ne hen no: nna nkan no na Hazor na ɔyɛ ahenman no ne tsir."

column2: "Na wɔdze afona anomu kunkum akra a wɔwɔ mu nyinara
column3: sɛɛ hɔn pasapasa: woenngyaa obiara a ogu ahom wɔ hɔ: na ɔdze gya hyeew Hazor."

column2: "Na ahemfo no hɔn nkurow nyinara
column3: nye no mu ahemfo nyinara Josua gyee
column5: na ɔsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'akowaa Moses hyɛe no."

column2: "Na nkurow a wɔdeda hɔn apempe do no dze
column3: Israel annhyew no mu biara
column4: gyedɛ Hazor nko; ɔno na Josua hyeew no."

column2: "Na nkurow yi mu asadze nyinara
column3: nye fiembowa no
column4: Israelmba no faa no afonam maa hɔnho
column8: na woenngyaa obiara a ogu ahom."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ n'akowaa Moses no
column3: dɛmara so na Moses hyɛɛ Josua: na dɛmara so na Josua yɛe; oenngyaa dza EWURADZE dze hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara mu biara a ɔannyɛ."

column2: "Nna Josua gyee asaase no nyinara
column3: nkokodo nkurow no
column9: nye ɔnoara so no bɔnmu nkurow no;"

column2: "ofi bepɔw Halak a ɔfow kɔ Seir ho
column3: mekyerɛ Baal-gad ho wɔ Lebanon ɔbɔn a ɔwɔ bepɔw Hermon ase no: na ɔfaa hɔn ahemfo nyinara

column2: "Josua nye ahemfo no nyinara dzii ako kyɛree."
"Kurow bi nnyi hɔ a ɔnye Israelmba yɛɛ nsiesie
column3: gyedɛ Hivifo a wɔtse Gibeon no nko: na wɔkoe gyee ne nyinara."

column2: "Na EWURADZE piriim hɔn akoma dɛ wonkehyia Israel wɔ ɔko mu
column3: ama ɔaasɛɛ hɔn pasapasa a worunnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na Josua baa aber no mu
column3: na obotwitwaa Anakfo no gui wɔ nkokodo nkurow no mu
column7: nye Juda nkokodo nkurow nyinara mu. Josua dze hɔn kaa hɔn nkurow ho sɛɛ hɔn pasapasa."

column2: "Woenngyaa Anakfo no mu biara wɔ Israelmba asaase do: Gaza
column3: Gat

column2: "Nna Josua gyee asaase no nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses no nyinara; na ɔdze maa Israel dɛ egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nkyekyɛmu tsetsee. Na asaase no so homee fii akodzi mu."
